title: Phase 1: Core UBS to Beads transformation
description: Implement basic UBS JSON to Beads JSONL pipeline with stdin/stdout interface

title: Phase 1: Core UBS to Beads transformation
description: Implement basic UBS JSON to Beads JSONL pipeline with stdin/stdout interface

title: Phase 1: Core UBS to Beads transformation
description: Implement basic UBS JSON to Beads JSONL pipeline with stdin/stdout interface

title: Define Beads issue struct
description: Create pkg/beads/issue.go with complete Beads issue type
design: Fields: id, title, type, priority, status, description, design, acceptance, assignee, timestamps
acceptance_criteria: Struct marshals to valid Beads JSONL format

title: Implement UBS JSON parser
description: Create pkg/parser/ubs.go to parse UBS findings array
design: Parse UBS JSON schema: findings array with file, line, column, severity, category, message, suggestion, code_snippet fields
acceptance_criteria: Successfully parses real UBS output; validates required fields

title: Implement transformation logic
description: Create pkg/transform/transform.go mapping UBS findings to Beads issues
design: Map: severity to priority, severity to type, file:line to title, message to description
acceptance_criteria: Transforms UBS finding to valid Beads issue with all fields populated

title: Build CLI entry point
design: Read JSON from stdin, transform, write JSONL to stdout. Flags: --min-severity, --version, --verbose
acceptance_criteria: Works: ubs --format=json src/ | strung | bd import

title: Add test fixtures and unit tests
description: Create testdata/ with real UBS output, add unit and integration tests
acceptance_criteria: All tests pass with greater than 80 percent coverage
